content.question:
Imagine that your are making an oral presentation to your Japanese class. First, you read the topic your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as full as possible.
Present your own view or perspective on famous Japanese people. Discuss at least FIVE aspects or examples of famous Japanese people.
Begin with an appropriate introduction, give details, explain your own view or perspective, and end with a concluding remark.
